website_summaries.verdict: Pants that protect against overnight bed-wetting with a stretchable and comfortable fit. There are designs available for boys and girls.
pros: Offered in three different sizes to help you find the best fit
Gives extra absorbency layers in the areas where kids need protection
Great characters printed on the outside so kids will have fun wearing them
cons: Feels a bit like a diaper, so some kids may react more slowly to potty training

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Pull-ups work well and provide a lot of leg protection. Be warned though, as you get closer to the max weight or your child is tall for his/her age you may have some leakage along the waist. Once you are in 5-7lbs of the max weight, move up to the next size.
customer_reviews.author: RJmom314

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I tested these with water and they will hold a crazy amount of liquid compared to anything else. They're the only thing my 2 year old hasn't leaked through. She didn't sleep in it very long though and woke up with very irritated private parts. They might be okay if used with diaper rash cream or if your kid doesn't have sensitive skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: If you have older kids, nothing works better. They are a but expense compared to other brands of training pants or even to pull-ups. However, in terms of absorbency, and fot nothing comes close. I got the Huggies Easy-ups to try and they are awful, they don’t fit properly in the back and sre uncomfortable. However, i never have such problems with Goodnights, these are awesome in that regard. I just wish you got a little more on each box.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to pee leaks
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years old pee a lot specially at bed time, I was finding my self waking up 2 times in the night to change her diaper because if I didn't the pee would leak, I was not resting as you could imagine, It was like having a newborn. I saw these at the supermarket and decided to give it a try. Let me tell you! The best decision I made, now i sleep through the night because I dont have to get up anymore to change her diapers, I put this pull up on and in the morning the bed is not wet, this pull up absorbs a lot, these are the best really.
customer_reviews.author: Giovannia

customer_reviews.title: No leaks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 year old who has occasional accidents at night. The pull up overnights weren't absorbent enough. These Good nights work great! She has not leaked through.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Teel

customer_reviews.title: No leakage
customer_reviews.text: Update: had to announce, happily, this is the last box of diaper I purchased. My daughter is potty trained and night time diaper free also!!!! Don’t leak, she obsessed with mermaid. Just perfect. She is 3 now and don’t wear diaper in day time. She says diapers are for babies and I’m not baby. But she likes these.
customer_reviews.author: Hirokoppe

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I was looking for something with more odor protection. My 3 year old does not leak out of them and they fit her ok, so they technically do the job, but the product description says they have some odor protection and they do not. That given I can use a cheaper brand for the same results.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.R.

customer_reviews.title: The solution for night time leaking!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 1/2 year old has been potty trained since just after 2 but is still a heavy wetter at night. We found that she was leaking through regular diapers every night. We have tried these for a few months and haven’t had 1 leak. We like that they’re pull up style and she seems to be comfortable in them. We started when she was right at 28 pounds and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Nighttime Potty Training
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for night time potty trainers. These are much more absorbent than day time pull ups. I was using a regular diaper at night but I feel like it's been hindering my daughters potty training being she feels safe wetting and pooping with a diaper on but pull ups she knows are more like panties. These are easy for her to pull up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Karen•in•California☀️

customer_reviews.title: Extremely absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: I have a potty trained toddler who still has accidents occasionally at night. Previously we were using pull-ups and suffering with leakage some nights -- once we tried Goodnites there was no going back. These are not as bulky as pull-ups and more absorbent. We will continue to purchase these until we are accident free at night!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Aston

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I have found these. I have a 4 year old who has been completely day trained since 2 years old. She is an ex9heavy sleeper and simply will not wake up to go potty at night. She is also a heavy wetter and always has been. She out grew diapers and we didnt know what else would keep her dry through the night. After one night of using Good Nites she didnt leak at all and these things held a ton of pee. I will keep buying this product as long as we need them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Latson

customer_reviews.title: Same as day time training pants.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because of the reviews of other parents who have children who wet the bed through their regular diapers at night. My son 2yr4mo, is potty trained in the day but still working around the clock, can’t seem to keep find a diaper that will hold it in during the night sleep. I’ve tried just about anything but even with these he will soak his clothes and be wet in the morning. Yes, I’ve cut the fluids at nights and ready to have a diaper on at night but not to be soaked through and washing sheets daily. Sorry but this provides he same protection as regular pull ups we use during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Great for children who are heavy wetter and don’t wake up at night to use the bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter doesn’t wake up at night to use the bathroom and she drinks a lot of liquids and is a heavy wetter. I have tried other brands of night time pull-ups but these are by far the most absorbent I have found where she doesn’t wet the bed and I don’t have to change a pull-up in the middle of the night. Also my daughter has SPD and hates feeling wet. These help her to sleep the whole night through comfortably and I have been using these for about 10 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but price is too high
customer_reviews.text: These work really well and prevent leaks, for the most part. Unfortunately these are priced noticeably more than their brick and mortar store counterparts.
customer_reviews.author: Ad n' Audie

customer_reviews.title: Great overnight!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed by this product. Not only is it good quality, But has cute characters. The only improvement I would suggest is more stretch in the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Mony G.

customer_reviews.title: No more nighttime leaks!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old is wearing diapers at night but they were leaking because her pull ups were too small - both the Pampers PullUps and Huggies PullUps. The overnights have been great. She quickly outgrew the extra small. She's 39 inches and weighs about 38 pounds and is now wearing the small.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: The only thing we can use for overnight
customer_reviews.text: We use these strictly for overnight wear for our almost 3yo who isn't potty trained yet. She kept wetting through her regular diapers during the overnight, so we tried these and boom. NO more leaking! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: No more leaks
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an overnight diaper for my girl.I tried so many diapers,then I found this one. It’s super absorbent.I will keep buying!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yishuai He

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs perfect
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than target or any other store! Trust me I price match and do coupons and this is still the best price! Fits like you bought it anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: We recently switched to these from Huggies night time diapers. Last night was the first night wearing them when she woke up she was absolutely soaked. These did not work very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Work well but don’t have Velcro closure
customer_reviews.text: Seem to work great but really wished they had Velcro or something on the side instead of tearing them off
customer_reviews.author: Killer bones 19

customer_reviews.title: Should have switched to these from normal diapers sooner
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite for our 15 month old. She’s not potty training yet but they are more comfortable for her and very absorbing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C Maniscalco Jr

customer_reviews.title: No leaks all night
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are pretty absorbent and we've almost never had an issue with them leaking - it takes quite a lot and in the past year we've been using them for our two little ones they've only leaked a handful of times. They are also thin and not bulky so comfortable for the kiddos. Definitely our choice for overnights!
customer_reviews.author: JEREMY HURLBERT

customer_reviews.title: Pull ups not underwear but still work
customer_reviews.text: These are pull ups not lined underwear like I thought but still cute and worked
customer_reviews.author: AMS48

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleep Diaper
customer_reviews.text: After trying so many sleep diapers, we found a Winner! These do not smell and are super absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for nighttime.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one multiple times because compared to some other brands and kinds, this one actually holds all night, no wet bed.
customer_reviews.author: young dad

customer_reviews.title: They work for us
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit expensive, but comparable to other overnite diapers, etc. So far there haven't been any leak-throughs as there have been occasionally in huggies overnites.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great even for small ones
customer_reviews.text: Started buying these for my 2 year old since shes potty trained but just having troubles at night and they are great. Love that i can get several of them at once
customer_reviews.author: Demetria Sconiers

customer_reviews.title: Best Bedtime incontinence underwear/pull ups!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a life saver!! Absolutely no leaks and they hold amazing!! I wish we would have started using these sooner! I Definitely will recommend these to my fellow moms who have heavy wetters.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: They are super absorbent! These are the only night time pull ups that don’t leak for us! And they hug her perfectly and she says they’re very comfy! We Love them! And my daughter loves the princess design :)
customer_reviews.author: Andria

customer_reviews.title: A skeptic converted
customer_reviews.text: I was a long time Huggies Overnight buyer. These have far surpassed my love of huggies. My daughter fits these better. There’s no doubt, I’ll be using these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke(Brandy)

customer_reviews.title: Good quality could use more bum room.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the mermaids and I love that it is fsa approved! They are good quality and absorb well, but she isn’t a heavy bedtime wetter. Only complaint is that her cheeks sometimes will wiggle out.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great night time diapers. Fit well and don’t leak. Works for my boy and girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for awesome night time pull ups then you have found the ones! I can compare these with other brands but this one is designed for toddlers specifically.. A+ from me on these for sure !
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: No more leaks
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but absolutely worth it. I tried every other brand before resorting to these. My kiddo has been sleeping in these for over a year with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Sean H

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best over night diapers I have ever had for my kids
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Honestly Huggie overnight do a way better job. These do leak and the move. Not very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with the Goodnites.... since using them only once did I experience any leakage, and that night my daughter had A LOT to drink!! 🤣 Definitely I recommend these for overnight sleeping coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Luvlyp

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves Ariel
customer_reviews.text: They haven't leaked, and our daughter is obsessed with princesses which makes this a nice combo.
customer_reviews.author: The Warden Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for night time wetting
customer_reviews.text: Our 2n5 year old is potty trained during the day, but is still wetting at night. These are great for that very issue. No leaks yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the fits. Makes her feel like she does not have a pull up on.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Goodnites underwear work great.
customer_reviews.text: Fit snug at waist and stays dry all night. No leak and soaked bedding. Would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: 4GC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids in between sizes!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite night time pants finally in the perfect size for my girl who is day time potty trained. Bonus is that Ariel is her favorite!
customer_reviews.author: AngieFlavored

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, my kids now sleep better at night without waking up soaking wet
customer_reviews.author: Desteny lopez

customer_reviews.title: Item not as listed
customer_reviews.text: I order these for my DAUGHTER and we received blue and red Spider-Man ones! My daughter is refusing to wear them and I ordered girls!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Blue

customer_reviews.title: No more changing wet bedding every day!
customer_reviews.text: Love the extra absorbency. Only issue is even the xs size is a little large for my 2 year old, so not as comfortable as her regular diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears these to bed and rarely has issues with leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Work fine.
customer_reviews.text: These are the same size as 3T-4T Overnight Pull Ups. Work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: We've used these for about 4 months. They are soft and easy up and down. We've had maybe 3 instances of wetting out of the diaper but the vast majority they have worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. We haven’t had one leak at night!
customer_reviews.author: bridget

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: worked great! fit my 3 year old who wears 3t pants and 2t/3t undies
customer_reviews.author: E Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Almost half came torn!
customer_reviews.text: These would be fine if we didn't have almost half of them with a detached side seam. These aren't a Velcro type that can be reattached. Will not order these again due to having to throw so many unused ones in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Carley

customer_reviews.title: Might as well not even be wearing a diaper
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Leaks big time, every single night. Just an average 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney G.

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been happy with the Tinkerbell diapers, but the new Little Mermaid print has more dye on it. The dye gave my kid a giant rash like a bright red chemical burn on her thigh. We switched to Bambo natural diapers but they are not nearly as absorbent as the Goodnights. But for sensitive skin I do not recommend the Ariel diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, no leaks.
customer_reviews.text: We've never had an issue with leaking. My little is in a 4/5 in clothes and about 40lbs. These fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Newman

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best there is for night time potty training!
customer_reviews.author: wvgirl4ever

customer_reviews.title: Not Disney Princess Print
customer_reviews.text: Underwear is fine, but they weren’t a Disney print as described.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Many of the pull ups we couldn’t use.
customer_reviews.text: Half of these pull ups were ripped on one side so we couldn’t use them.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Plumb

customer_reviews.title: A great product to have
customer_reviews.text: This product although costly was great. The measurements were precise. The product looked good and I was throughly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Very absorbent. Only had 2 blowouts in 2 months and before these it was all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Got boys; ordered girls
customer_reviews.text: I ordered girls, and got boys. Fortunately, I have a pretty flexible little girl who is cool wearing spider man instead of little mermaid.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: Best nightime diapers. Period!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried them all, you name it. Huggies nighttime is great but the hard plastic on the sides pokes into my kids sides and hurts them. Pampers nighttime sizes start off too big (4-5 kid) when I need 2T-3T. Goodnites is a bit pricey but they have the soft sides, smaller sizes and nighttime protection my kids and their bed need versus any daytime diapers.
customer_reviews.author: toocrazyy21

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I believe they really work equally as efficient as more pricy options. My daughter drinks water heavily at night and we have had very minimal leakage. While no one nighttime diaper is perfect for every child, I would say 18-19/20 nights she wakes up completely dry with sheets still smelling fresh. I buy these on Amazon because I can never find x-small in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Did not come in a package, are like diapers More than underpants, not as expected at all Don’t even think these are authentic.
customer_reviews.author: cf

customer_reviews.title: Thank to these I can sleep again
customer_reviews.text: One of the best overnight diapers avail. This is especially important when your toddler decides your bed is their bed so unless you enjoy waking up to warm pee on you... spend the money and buy these. In all seriousness these hold a lot of liquid when my daughter is teething she drinks more at night so she pees a lot more and these things allow you to get the precious sleep your toddler requires and parents require.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: No more leaks! Sleeping all night again!
customer_reviews.text: When Huggies nighttime size 6 diapers started leaking, causing middle of the night wakings, we looked for alternatives... after a week of using these, I feel confident in reviewing them. My two year old hasn’t leaked once and she FILLS diapers... these hold up very well!! They are very soft and stretchy too! She wears 3t-4t sized clothing and size 6 daytime diapers. She loves having Ariel on them too, just an added bonus that she enjoys the design!
customer_reviews.author: TheTonnina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trying to night train
customer_reviews.text: Switched from Huggies Overnights to these to try to get our 4 year old night time trained. She is fully day trained but having to use the overnight diapers keeps her from having to worry about not going in her pants since she can't pull them up or down. We made a BIG deal about her new sleepy panties (rather than a diaper) and she's only had 2 times in a week that she peed in the new panties. Wonderful change, and I think we'll be into regular big girl panties overnight soon. These have no leak issues when she does have an accident.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrsW

customer_reviews.title: The best absorbency night time diaper ever!
customer_reviews.text: We tried every diaper brand out there for my non-potty traind two year old, she soaked through every brand we tried for night time use until we tried these ones. We used "Huggies night time" size 6 on a regular basis before we bought these but still had regular issues with leaking. We bought the size small "goodnites" And it's a game changer. No more wet baby and changing sheets everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Raylene

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 2.5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is potty training, and sometimes wakes up at night wanting to pee in the potty. I was using Huggies overnites which are WONDERFUL, (we had tried other brands, having leakage issues) and now we needed to switch to training pants. I was skeptical because they seem thin, so I double diapered on the first try. They really held up! She slept all through the night, and there had been no leakage. The second diaper was completely dry. I rarely leave reviews, but I am SO excited for these underwear!!!! (You know you're a parent when diapers make you happy)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ariel isn't on it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little sad because Ariel isn't on it and i've been touting the ariel on the pull up to my daughter to get her excited to wear them when they arrived - it has shells and different items on the pull up. So if that's a deciding factor for using these, like they were for us - Ariel isn't on it.
customer_reviews.author: Seth And Lara

customer_reviews.title: Fit a toddler that wears size 3T on clothes and 4T on underwear... No leaks during the night!
customer_reviews.text: Work really well for my daughter. She weighs 26 pounds and uses size 3T of clothes, 4T of underwear and these fit her really well. They are not so tight on her they feel really soft. They hold up during the entire night. I've never had any leak problem. O would highly recommend these ones if your little one is already potty trained but needs a diaper during the night.
customer_reviews.author: themonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Not any different from pull-ups
customer_reviews.text: They seem identical as the pull-ups we use for the day. I didn't think the good nites would come apart at the sides. Our child sometimes takes them off at night instead of just sliding them down to go potty, then they can't get them back on again.
customer_reviews.author: heavy74

customer_reviews.title: No more leaks!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old wears pullups at night, and we recently started having consistent leaking no matter what we did. We switched to Goodnites based on the reviews here, and have had no more leaks! We don't even have to use a diaper cover with these.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna M Horn

customer_reviews.title: Set up auto ship for even a better price!
customer_reviews.text: Have these being sent on auto ship and it’s wonderful. My little one isn’t potty trained yet and the night diapers weren’t doing it anymore. I found these and she loves her nighttime mermaid diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Mischa Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. My 2.5 year old loves the ariel design and doesn't fight me to put them on. She's 38 inches and 34 lbs. they fit well with room to grow. We haven't had a leak issue yet. She's been wearing them for bedtime about a month now. Will continue buying until she stops peeing at night.
customer_reviews.author: Cycle

customer_reviews.title: They don't look like the picture. Whoops.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to night time train my daughter (she just turned 4) these look just like diapers. They are white with Ariel printed on them. I thiught they would look slightly more like underwear as the picture suggests. Other than that, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Size. Difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought the exact same diapers that I bought last August and for some reason they are not the same. They are smaller! Don't understand why????
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Walling

customer_reviews.title: They do a good job
customer_reviews.text: These have good stretch and seem comfortable. They have decent absorbency. May need to add a sposie to them
customer_reviews.author: Gary Uzonyi

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using these for over a year. She's now 2. No more leaks at night! Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Caprice S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew sooner. My 2 yr old isn’t ready to potty train but was leaking out of her diaper at night. These are amazing no leaks and super absorbent. And they fit her perfect no booty cheeks hanging out like pull ups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears these at night & she has never leaked through. Wonderful overnights/pull-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C.

customer_reviews.title: Work good for small accidents...full nights potty not so much
customer_reviews.text: These work great if it's just a little pee... but for our 6yo she doesnt always wake to go potty & has an accident. It seeps through the diapers & makes everything from the jammies to the sheets & blankets smell. :(
customer_reviews.author: 1RadMomof5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zero seep through. Heavy pee’er and it holds it all well! Comparable to the Pampers pull ups. They do *not* refasten on the sides. You either have to slip them down or rip them apart to come off....which I LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Work well for toddlers ovenight protection
customer_reviews.text: These work well for my granddaughter, but are crazy expensive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Mess
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo busted and destroyed all contents. Amazon wants me to print 7 different labels to return back each item destroyed. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: Just diapers
customer_reviews.text: This is not “nighttime underwear.” These are just regular pull-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: We switched to these for nighttime bc they were out of pull-ups and had mire leaks and bed changed than ever before!
customer_reviews.author: JvK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the night
customer_reviews.text: If your kid sleeps on his belly you do want does
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Prevents Leaks
customer_reviews.text: We make sure our LO goes potty before bed and then there are no leaks with these pullups.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good absorbency
customer_reviews.text: It holds pretty well for my daughter. Sue always has full diaper in the morning. Never leak.
customer_reviews.author: Iris T

customer_reviews.title: Pampers easy ups worked better for
customer_reviews.text: Cute but leaked. Pampers easy ups worked better for us
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: These are much better at odor control and absorbency than the nighttime version of training pants. This is important for kids who are not "training"!
customer_reviews.author: D. Frank Berrodin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable for little one than the pull-ups for night time :)
customer_reviews.author: Drew West

customer_reviews.title: Pull ups are better. Same absorbency though, no leaks.
customer_reviews.text: This works, But I like pull-ups better. I don’t like that there aren’t Velcro edges, drives me nuts and makes it harder to pull off.
customer_reviews.author: Haleighreviews

product_meta.title: Goodnites Bedwetting Underwear for Girls, XS, 44 Ct, Packaging May Vary
product_meta.description: Size:X-Small| Style:Giga PackHelp your child wake up dry with the #1 Nighttime Underwear* for bedwetting. Goodnites provide the best nighttime protection guaranteed** for kids age 3-12. These disposable pants feature Double Leg Barriers to help eliminate leaks and 5 Layer Protection to absorb & lock away wetness. Goodnites also feature a super stretchy waistband for a comfortable, underwear-like fit that accommodates all body shapes. Unlike training pants, Goodnites bedwetting underwear discreetly absorb odor and offer 40% more protection*** where she needs it most. Plus your child will love going to bed wearing her favorite Disney princess designs.
